location.en: Nangang District, Taipei, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家学院及学术最高研究机构，为总统府直属机关。
description.en: The national academy and the highest academic research institution of the Republic of China, operating directly under the Presidential Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统的幕僚机关，负责处理与总统、副总统有关的行政事务。
description.en: The administrative and advisory body to the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾学者，现任中央研究院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese scholar, the current President of Academia Sinica.

en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The office of the head of state of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、政治人物，提出设立中央研究院案。
description.en: A Chinese educator and politician who proposed the establishment of Academia Sinica.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央政治会议

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央政治会议

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在训政时期的最高决策机构。
description.en: The highest decision-making body of the Kuomintang during the Political Tutelage period.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、革命家，中央研究院的共同起草人及首任院长。
description.en: A Chinese educator and revolutionary, a co-drafter of Academia Sinica's organic law and its first president.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、商人，中央研究院的共同起草人之一。
description.en: A Chinese politician and businessman, one of the co-drafters of Academia Sinica's organic law.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、教育家，曾任中央研究院代理院长及院长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and educator who served as Acting President and President of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家、文学家，曾任中央研究院院长。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher and writer who served as President of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、学者，曾任中央研究院院长。
description.en: A politician and scholar of the Republic of China who served as President of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 中国化学家、教育家，曾任中央研究院院长。
description.en: A Chinese chemist and educator who served as President of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，曾任中央研究院院长。
description.en: A Chinese-born physicist who served as President of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 台湾化学家，诺贝尔化学奖得主，曾任中央研究院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese chemist and Nobel laureate in Chemistry, who served as President of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 台湾化学家，曾任中央研究院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese chemist who served as President of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 二十世纪中期中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: A military conflict fought primarily between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan from 1937 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 1984年6月3日在台湾北部发生的严重水灾事件。
description.en: A severe flood event that occurred in northern Taiwan on June 3, 1984.

description.zh-cn: 2001年侵袭台湾的强烈台风，造成严重灾情。
description.en: A powerful typhoon that struck Taiwan in 2001, causing severe damage.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾士林地方法院检察署的简称。
description.en: Abbreviation for the Taiwan Shilin District Prosecutors Office of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的一部刑事特别法，主要规范公务员的贪污行为。
description.en: A special criminal law in the Republic of China that primarily governs corruption by public officials.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的三级法院之一，位于台北市士林区。
description.en: One of the third-level courts in the Republic of China, located in Shilin District, Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 台湾生物化学家，曾任中央研究院生物化学研究所所长，因论文造假事件去职。
description.en: A Taiwanese biochemist who formerly served as the director of the Institute of Biochemical Sciences at Academia Sinica and resigned due to a research misconduct scandal.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国俄亥俄州哥伦布市的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Columbus, Ohio, United States.

nodes.id: 台湾高等教育产业工会

zh-cn: 台湾高等教育产业工会

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个产业工会，致力于维护高等教育工作者的劳动权益。
description.en: An industrial union in Taiwan dedicated to protecting the labor rights of higher education workers.

description.zh-cn: 由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）引起的全球大流行性疾病。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

description.zh-cn: 中国近代第一个综合性科学团体。
description.en: The first comprehensive scientific society in modern China.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，为中央研究院提供了拉丁文译名“Academia Sinica”。
description.en: A Chinese educator who provided the Latin name 'Academia Sinica' for the institution.

description.zh-cn: 中央研究院为中华民国总统府的直属机构。
description.en: Academia Sinica is a direct institution under the Presidential Office of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在中国国民党中央政治会议上提出设立中央研究院案。
description.en: Proposed the establishment of Academia Sinica at a meeting of the KMT's Central Political Council.

relationships.source: 中国国民党中央政治会议

description.zh-cn: 会议上决议通过设立中央研究院的提案。
description.en: Resolved to approve the proposal to establish Academia Sinica during a meeting.

description.zh-cn: 担任中央研究院首任院长，直至逝世。
description.en: Served as the first President of Academia Sinica until his death.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统根据中央研究院评议会选举的候选人名单，遴选并任命廖俊智为院长。
description.en: The President of the Republic of China selected and appointed Liao Chun-chih as President from a list of candidates elected by the Council of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 创办中央研究院的主要成员是中国科学社社员，成立后也接收了其作为中国科学界官方代表的地位。
description.en: The main founders of Academia Sinica were members of the Science Society of China, and after its establishment, Academia Sinica took over its status as the official representative of the Chinese scientific community internationally.

description.zh-cn: 为中央研究院提供了拉丁文译名“Academia Sinica”。
description.en: Provided the Latin name 'Academia Sinica' for the institution.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，中央研究院被迫西迁至昆明、桂林、四川李庄等地。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Academia Sinica was forced to relocate westward to places like Kunming, Guilin, and Lizhuang in Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 六三水灾造成四分溪暴涨，导致中研院院区严重淹水。
description.en: The June 3 Flood caused the Sifen Creek to overflow, leading to severe flooding in the Academia Sinica campus.

description.zh-cn: 纳莉台风带来的豪雨导致四分溪暴涨，侵袭了中央研究院七个研究所的地下楼层，造成重大损失。
description.en: Heavy rains from Typhoon Nari caused the Sifen Creek to overflow, flooding the basement levels of seven research institutes at Academia Sinica and causing significant damage.

description.zh-cn: 2020年3月发生院内群聚感染事件，2021年12月一名P3实验室研究助理因违反SOP而染疫。
description.en: A cluster infection occurred within the institution in March 2020, and in December 2021, a research assistant in a P3 laboratory was infected due to an SOP violation.

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌对价利益输送，士林地检署将时任院长翁启惠列为《贪污治罪条例》被告，限制其出境，并于2017年1月提起公诉。
description.en: Due to suspicion of quid pro quo bribery, the Shilin District Prosecutors Office listed then-President Wong Chi-huey as a defendant under the Anti-Corruption Act, restricted him from leaving the country, and indicted him in January 2017.

description.zh-cn: 一审宣判翁启惠无罪，因检方未上诉而无罪定谳。
description.en: The court acquitted Wong Chi-huey in the first trial; the verdict became final as the prosecution did not appeal.

description.zh-cn: 时任生化所所长陈庆士被揭发多篇论文造假，重创了中研院的学术声望与研究水准。
description.en: Then-director of the Institute of Biochemical Sciences, Chen Ching-shih, was exposed for fabricating data in multiple research papers, severely damaging the academic reputation and research standards of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 俄亥俄州立大学的调查报告认定陈庆士存在学术不端行为，并建议撤稿。
description.en: An investigation report by The Ohio State University found Chen Ching-shih guilty of academic misconduct and recommended retraction of his papers.

relationships.source: 台湾高等教育产业工会

description.zh-cn: 自2019年起，高教工会揭露并抗议中央研究院内部存在的违法解雇、职场霸凌等劳动环境问题。
description.en: Starting in 2019, the Taiwan Higher Education Union exposed and protested against labor issues within Academia Sinica, including illegal dismissals and workplace bullying.
